changes.notable_changes: Redaction of query parameters in CRI error logs, fixes for image defaults on Darwin, resolution of potential panic issues, update of runc binary to v1.3.4, and fixes for parsing hugetlb.<size>.events files. Dependency updates include NRI to v0.11.0, CDI to v1.1.0, and containerd/zfs to v2.0.0.
changes.security_updates: Updated golang.org/x/crypto to v0.45.0, which may include security-related improvements.
changes.upgrade_notes: Ensure compatibility with updated dependencies such as NRI v0.11.0, CDI v1.1.0, containerd/zfs v2.0.0, and golang.org/x/crypto v0.45.0. Additionally, runc binary has been updated to v1.3.4.
